text: The 2019 SAFF U-15 Women's Championship was the 3rd edition of the SAFF U-15 Women's Championship, an international football competition for women's under-15 national teams organized by SAFF. The tournament was hosted by Thimpu, Bhutan from 9 October to 15 October 2019. Four teams from the region will take part. ==Squads== Players born on or after 1 January 2004 are eligible to compete in the tournament. Each team have to register a squad of minimum 18 players and maximum 23 players, minimum three of whom had to be goalkeepers. ==Participating nations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:16.67%;"|Team ! style="width:16.67%;"|Appearances in the SAFF U-15 Women's Championship !width=39%|Previous best performance |- | align="left"| |align=center| 3rd |align=center| Champions (2017) |- | align="left"| (Host) |align=center| 3rd |align=center| 3rd (2018) |- | align="left"| |align=center| 3rd |align=center| Champions (2018) |- | align="left"| |align=center| 3rd |align=center| 4th (2018) |} ==Venue== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Thimpu |- | Changlimithang Stadium |- | Capacity: 25,000 |- | 400px |} == Round robin == All the four teams will play each other in a round robin phase and the top two teams will play the final. *All matches will be played at Thimphu, Bhutan. *Times listed are UTC+06:00. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=2|Key to colours in group tables |- |bgcolor=#ccffcc style="width: 20px;"| |align=left|Advance to Final |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final== \---- ==Awards== ==Goalscorers== \---- ==Broadcasting rights== {| class="wikitable" |- !Country !Broadcaster |- |' (host) |rowspan="3"|MYCUJOO.TV |- |South Asian Countries |- |South-East Asian Countries |} \---- ==References== 2019 Category:2019 in women's association football Category:2019 in Asian football Category:2019 in Bhutanese football Category:2019–20 in Nepalese football Category:2019–20 in Indian football Category:2019 in Bangladeshi football Category:2019 in Maldivian football Category:2019–20 in Pakistani football Category:2019–20 in Sri Lankan football Category:International association football competitions hosted by Bhutan Category:2019 in youth association football
title: 2019 SAFF U-15 Women's Championship
